spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Suldil Baldoriel is an 16th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Suldil can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Mounted
entries: If Suldil isn't mounted, she can use a bonus mount, provided Suldil and the young bronze dragon are on the same plane of existence. When she teleports, Suldil appears astride the young bronze dragon along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, Suldil can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both her and her mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

trait.name: Young Bronze Dragon
entries: Suldil is accompanied by a young bronze dragon. The dragon allows Suldil to use him as a mount.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.
